title: How AI ‘world models’ could change the way video games are made and played
description: New artificial intelligence systems that generate entire 3D environments are being pitched as a turning point for a $190 billion industry—but they are also stirring anxiety among developers and artists.

title: New AI Tool Can Predict Blood Loss With Accuracy During Liposuction

title: Which insurance trends and opportunities will define 2026?
description: Powered by artificial intelligence, rising climate risks, and changing customer expectations, the insurance industry is now silently transforming itself. Some of the trends that we may see in 2026 could look very different from what most people expect today.

title: Driving the Circular economy: Role of AI and emerging technologies
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing waste management. AI-powered robots sort waste with high accuracy, improving recycling. Predictive systems optimize collection routes, reducing emissions. Smart bins alert services for timely pickups.
